name: ocbesbn-service-template
description: Provides a sekeleton template for OpusCapita Business Network services.
author: kwierchris

scripts.test: npm run clean ; npm run setupConsul ; ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/nyc ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/mocha --recursive -R mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.setupConsul: curl -X PUT -d 'bnp' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/{{your-service-name}}/MYSQL_DATABASE ; curl -X PUT -d 'root' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/{{your-service-name}}/MYSQL_USER ; curl -X PUT -d 'notSecurePa55w0rd' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/{{your-service-name}}/MYSQL_PASSWORD
